item.title: Goldman says buy shares of the Chili's owner on the dip, predicts 40% upside ahead
item.description: Goldman Sachs is maintaining its buy rating on Brinker International, despite traders sending shares 15% lower after the Chili's owner reported earnin...

item.title: Wells Fargo upgrades Sherwin-Williams to overweight, cites limited headwinds from tariffs
item.description: Wells Fargo's price target of $420 implies a potential upside of 21% for shares of Sherwin-Williams.

item.title: Wells Fargo downgrades Nike to equal weight on a looming ‘mild’ recession
item.description: Wells Fargo sees shares of Nike shedding 4% from here.

item.title: First Solar delivered a first-quarter earnings miss. Here’s how analysts reacted
item.description: Most analysts remained optimistic despite creeping tariff uncertainty.

item.title: Starbucks delivered earnings that disappointed Wall Street’s forecasts. Here’s what analysts had to say
item.description: Analysts seemed optimistic in CEO Brian Niccol's potential to turn around the coffee retailer.
